description: This file defines the Event entity class used to model event data within the system, including attributes like title, description, times, location, capacity, organizer, tags, and a set of attendees.

classes.name: Event
classes.description: Entity class representing an event, with fields for event details and a collection of attendees.

methods.name: Event
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for initializing an Event with detailed attributes.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the event.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier of the event.

methods.name: getOrganizer
methods.description: Retrieves the organizer of the event.

methods.name: getTags
methods.description: Retrieves the tags associated with the event.

methods.name: setTags
methods.description: Sets the tags for the event.

methods.name: getAttendees
methods.description: Retrieves the set of attendees for the event.

methods.name: setAttendees
methods.description: Sets the attendees for the event.

methods.name: getAttendanceCount
methods.description: Returns the number of attendees for the event.
